name: @trz/type
description: A tool for real type validate.
author: CHEN·ZHENYUA <JAYNE@CHENZHENYUAN.COM>

scripts.build: npm run clean && npx babel src --out-dir='./release' --extensions='.ts' --config-file='../../.babelrc' --no-comments && npx tsc --baseUrl .  --rootDir ./src --outDir ./release
scripts.release:pre: npm run clean && npm run build && npx cpr package.json release/ && npx cpr README.md release/ && npx cpr LICENSE release/ && npx cpr CHANGELOG.md release/
scripts.release: npm run release:pre && cd release && npm publish --access=public --registry=https://registry.npmjs.org
